problem_names: lemmas YFtorNT_defs = YFtorNT'_def YFtorNT_def MakeNT_def
lemma YFtorNTCatDom: "NTCatDom (YFtorNT C f) = Op C"
lemma YFtorNTCatCod: "NTCatCod (YFtorNT C f) = SET"
lemma YFtorNTApp1: assumes "X \<in> Obj (NTCatDom (YFtorNT C f))" shows "(YFtorNT C f) $$ X = Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[X,f]"
lemmas YFtor_defs = YFtor'_def YFtor_def MakeFtor_def

lemma YFtorNTNatTrans':
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "f \<in> Mor C"
  shows "NatTransP (YFtorNT' C f)"

lemma YFtorNTNatTrans:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "f \<in> Mor C"
  shows "NatTrans (YFtorNT C f)"

lemma YFtorNTMor:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "f \<in> Mor C"
  shows "YFtorNT C f \<in> Mor (CatExp (Op C) SET)"

lemma YFtorNtMapsTo:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "f \<in> Mor C"
  shows "YFtorNT C f maps\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,dom\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f]) to (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,cod\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f])"

lemma YFtorNTCompDef:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "f \<approx>>\<^bsub>C\<^esub> g"
  shows "YFtorNT C f \<approx>>\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> YFtorNT C g"
lemma PreSheafCat: "LSCategory C \<Longrightarrow> Category (CatExp (Op C) SET)"

lemma YFtor'Obj1:
  assumes "X \<in> Obj (CatDom (YFtor' C))" and "LSCategory C"
  shows "(YFtor' C) ## (Id (CatDom (YFtor' C)) X) = Id (CatCod (YFtor' C)) (Hom\<^bsub>C \<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X])"

lemma YFtorPreFtor:
  assumes "LSCategory C"
  shows   "PreFunctor (YFtor' C)"

lemma YFtor'Obj:
  assumes "X \<in> Obj (CatDom (YFtor' C))"
  and     "LSCategory C" 
  shows   "(YFtor' C) @@ X = Hom\<^bsub>C \<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]"

lemma YFtorFtor':
  assumes "LSCategory C"
  shows   "FunctorM (YFtor' C)"
lemma YFtorFtor: assumes "LSCategory C" shows "Ftor (YFtor C) : C \<longrightarrow> (CatExp (Op C) SET)"

lemma YFtorObj: 
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "X \<in> Obj C"
  shows "(YFtor C) @@ X = Hom\<^bsub>C \<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]"

lemma YFtorObj2:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "X \<in> Obj C" and "Y \<in> Obj C"
  shows "((YFtor C) @@ Y) @@ X = Hom\<^bsub>C \<^esub>X Y"
lemma YFtorMor: "\<lbrakk>LSCategory C ; f \<in> Mor C\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (YFtor C) ## f = YFtorNT C f"

lemma YMapInvApp: 
  assumes "X \<in> Obj C" and "B \<in> Obj C" and "LSCategory C"
  shows "(YMapInv C X F x) $$ B = ZFfun (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub> B X) (F @@ B) (\<lambda> f . (F ## (z2m\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f)) |@| x)"

lemma YMapImage:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "Ftor F : (Op C) \<longrightarrow> SET" and "X \<in> Obj C"
  and "NT \<eta> : (YFtor C @@ X) \<Longrightarrow> F"
  shows "(YMap C X \<eta>) |\<in>| (F @@ X)"

lemma YMapInvNatTransP:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "Ftor F : (Op C) \<longrightarrow> SET" and xobj: "X \<in> Obj C" and xinF: "x |\<in>| (F @@ X)"
  shows "NatTransP (YMapInv' C X F x)"

lemma YMapInvNatTrans:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "Ftor F : (Op C) \<longrightarrow> SET" and "X \<in> Obj C" and "x |\<in>| (F @@ X)"
  shows "NatTrans (YMapInv C X F x)"

lemma YMapInvImage:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "Ftor F : (Op C) \<longrightarrow> SET" and "X \<in> Obj C"
  and "x |\<in>| (F @@ X)"
  shows "NT (YMapInv C X F x) : (YFtor C @@ X) \<Longrightarrow> F"

lemma YMap1:
  assumes LSCat: "LSCategory C" and Fftor: "Ftor F : (Op C) \<longrightarrow> SET" and XObj: "X \<in> Obj C"
  and NT: "NT \<eta> : (YFtor C @@ X) \<Longrightarrow> F"
  shows "YMapInv C X F (YMap C X \<eta>) = \<eta>"

lemma YMap2:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "Ftor F : (Op C) \<longrightarrow> SET" and "X \<in> Obj C"
  and "x |\<in>| (F @@ X)"
  shows "YMap C X (YMapInv C X F x) = x"

lemma YFtorNT_YMapInv:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "f maps\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X to Y"
  shows "YFtorNT C f = YMapInv C X (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,Y]) (m2z\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f)"

lemma YMapYoneda:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "f maps\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X to Y"
  shows "YFtor C ## f = YMapInv C X (YFtor C @@ Y) (m2z\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f)"

lemma YonedaFull: 
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "X \<in> Obj C" and "Y \<in> Obj C"
  and "NT \<eta> : (YFtor C @@ X) \<Longrightarrow> (YFtor C @@ Y)"
  shows "YFtor C ## (z2m\<^bsub>C\<^esub> (YMap C X \<eta>)) = \<eta>"
  and "z2m\<^bsub>C\<^esub> (YMap C X \<eta>) maps\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X to Y"

lemma YonedaFaithful:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "f maps\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X to Y" and "g maps\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X to Y"
  and "YFtor C ## f = YFtor C ## g"
  shows "f = g"

lemma YonedaEmbedding:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "A \<in> Obj C" and "B \<in> Obj C" and "(YFtor C) @@ A = (YFtor C) @@ B"
  shows "A = B"

definition 
  "YFtor' C \<equiv> \<lparr>
         CatDom = C , 
         CatCod = CatExp (Op C) SET , 
         MapM = \<lambda> f . YFtorNT C f
  \<rparr>"
definition "YFtor C \<equiv> MakeFtor(YFtor' C)"
lemmas YFtor_defs = YFtor'_def YFtor_def MakeFtor_def

lemma YFtorNTNatTrans':
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "f \<in> Mor C"
  shows "NatTransP (YFtorNT' C f)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NatTransP (YFtorNT' C f)
proof(auto simp only: NatTransP_def)

proof (state)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. Functor (NTDom (YFtorNT' C f))
 2. Functor (NTCod (YFtorNT' C f))
 3. NTCatDom (YFtorNT' C f) = CatDom (NTCod (YFtorNT' C f))
 4. NTCatCod (YFtorNT' C f) = CatCod (NTDom (YFtorNT' C f))
 5. \<And>X.
       X \<in> obj\<^bsub>NTCatDom (YFtorNT' C f)\<^esub> \<Longrightarrow>
       YFtorNT' C f $$
       X maps\<^bsub>NTCatCod (YFtorNT' C f)\<^esub> NTDom (YFtorNT' C f) @@
               X to NTCod (YFtorNT' C f) @@ X
 6. \<And>fa X Y.
       fa maps\<^bsub>NTCatDom (YFtorNT' C f)\<^esub> X to Y \<Longrightarrow>
       NTDom (YFtorNT' C f) ## fa ;;\<^bsub>NTCatCod (YFtorNT' C f)\<^esub>
       (YFtorNT' C f $$ Y) =
       YFtorNT' C f $$ X ;;\<^bsub>NTCatCod (YFtorNT' C f)\<^esub>
       (NTCod (YFtorNT' C f) ## fa)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):

proof(auto simp add: CatExp_def CatExp'_def MakeCatMor)

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. NatTrans (YFtorNT C f)
 2. NTCatDom (YFtorNT C f) = Op C
 3. NTCatCod (YFtorNT C f) = SET
have "f \<in> Mor C"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  LSCategory C
  f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. NatTrans (YFtorNT C f)
 2. NTCatDom (YFtorNT C f) = Op C
 3. NTCatCod (YFtorNT C f) = SET
thus "NatTrans (YFtorNT C f)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NatTrans (YFtorNT C f)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
  LSCategory C
  f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NatTrans (YFtorNT C f)
by (simp add: YFtorNTNatTrans)

proof (state)
this:
  NatTrans (YFtorNT C f)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. NTCatDom (YFtorNT C f) = Op C
 2. NTCatCod (YFtorNT C f) = SET
show "NTCatDom (YFtorNT C f) = Op C"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NTCatDom (YFtorNT C f) = Op C
by (simp add: YFtorNTCatDom)

proof (state)
this:
  NTCatDom (YFtorNT C f) = Op C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NTCatCod (YFtorNT C f) = SET
show "NTCatCod (YFtorNT C f) = SET"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. NTCatCod (YFtorNT C f) = SET
by (simp add: YFtorNTCatCod)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma YFtorNTCompDef:
  assumes "LSCategory C" and "f \<approx>>\<^bsub>C\<^esub> g"
  shows "YFtorNT C f \<approx>>\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> YFtorNT C g"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. YFtorNT C f \<approx>>\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> YFtorNT C g
proof(rule CompDefinedI)

proof (state)

    dom\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> YFtorNT C g
have "f \<in> Mor C" and "g \<in> Mor C"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub> &&& g \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  LSCategory C
  f \<approx>>\<^bsub>C\<^esub> g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub> &&& g \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
  g \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. YFtorNT C f \<in> mor\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub>
 2. YFtorNT C g \<in> mor\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub>
 3. cod\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> YFtorNT C f =
    dom\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> YFtorNT C g

hence 1: "YFtorNT C f maps\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,dom\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f]) to (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,cod\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f])"
    and 2: "YFtorNT C g maps\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,dom\<^bsub>C\<^esub> g]) to (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,cod\<^bsub>C\<^esub> g])"

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
  g \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>

goal (1 subgoal):

    YFtorNT C
     g maps\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,dom\<^bsub>C\<^esub> g] to Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,cod\<^bsub>C\<^esub> g]
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
  g \<in> mor\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
  LSCategory C
  f \<approx>>\<^bsub>C\<^esub> g

goal (1 subgoal):

    YFtorNT C

thus "YFtorNT C f \<in> mor\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub>"

have "cod\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> YFtorNT C f = (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,cod\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f])"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):

    Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,cod\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f]
using 1

proof (prove)
using this:
  YFtorNT C
   f maps\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,dom\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f] to Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,cod\<^bsub>C\<^esub> f]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cod\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> YFtorNT C f =

this:

have "dom\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> YFtorNT C g = (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,dom\<^bsub>C\<^esub> g])"

lemma YFtor'Obj1:
  assumes "X \<in> Obj (CatDom (YFtor' C))" and "LSCategory C"
  shows "(YFtor' C) ## (Id (CatDom (YFtor' C)) X) = Id (CatCod (YFtor' C)) (Hom\<^bsub>C \<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X])"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. YFtor' C ## id\<^bsub>CatDom (YFtor' C)\<^esub> X =
    id\<^bsub>CatCod (YFtor' C)\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X])
proof(simp add: YFtor'_def, rule NatTransExt)

proof (state)
goal (5 subgoals):
 1. NatTrans (YFtorNT C (id\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X))
 2. NatTrans
     (id\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]))
 3. NTDom (YFtorNT C (id\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X)) =
    NTDom
     (id\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]))
 4. NTCod (YFtorNT C (id\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X)) =
    NTCod
     (id\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]))
 5. \<And>Xa.
       Xa \<in> obj\<^bsub>NTCatDom (YFtorNT C (id\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X))\<^esub> \<Longrightarrow>
       YFtorNT C (id\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X) $$ Xa =
       id\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]) $$
       Xa
have Obj: "X \<in> Obj C"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<in> obj\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  X \<in> obj\<^bsub>CatDom (YFtor' C)\<^esub>
  LSCategory C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<in> obj\<^bsub>C\<^esub>
by (simp add: YFtor'_def)

proof (state)
this:
  X \<in> obj\<^bsub>C\<^esub>

goal (5 subgoals):
 1. NatTrans (YFtorNT C (id\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X))
 2. NatTrans
     (id\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]))
 3. NTDom (YFtorNT C (id\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X)) =
    NTDom
     (id\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]))
 4. NTCod (YFtorNT C (id\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X)) =
    NTCod
     (id\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]))
 5. \<And>Xa.
       Xa \<in> obj\<^bsub>NTCatDom (YFtorNT C (id\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X))\<^esub> \<Longrightarrow>
       YFtorNT C (id\<^bsub>C\<^esub> X) $$ Xa =
       id\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub> (Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]) $$
       Xa
have HomObj: "(Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]) \<in> Obj (CatExp (Op C) SET)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Hom\<^bsub>C\<^esub>[\<midarrow>,X]
    \<in> obj\<^bsub>CatExp (Op C) SET\<^esub>
using assms Obj

proof (prove)
using this:
  X \<in> obj\<^bsub>CatDom (YFtor' C)\<^esub>
